text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a REF

name: ParticipationReferrer
title: ParticipationReferrer
description: A person having referred the subject of the service to the performer (referring physician). Typically, a referring physician will receive a report.
